enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve wrapping a map-like object for specific operations (read and write).
Both methods handle null inputs and return a valid map object.
The writableMap method is often used before or after putAll to ensure the map is writable before adding multiple entries.

enhanced_by.method_name: populateMap(Map<K, V>, Iterable<? extends V>, Transformer<V, K>)
enhanced_by.reason: The writableMap method is often used before populating the map to ensure it is writable.
